import React from 'react' import { useTranslation } from 'lib/../i18n' import { DropdownGeneric } from 'lib/components/DropdownGeneric' import { PTCopyToClipboard } from 'lib/components/PTCopyToClipboard' import { useEthereumLootBoxQuery } from 'lib/hooks/useEthereumLootBoxQuery' export function ContributeToLootBoxDropdown(props) { const { t } = useTranslation() const { pool } = props // const { lootBoxAddress, tokenId } = useGraphLootBoxQuery(lootBoxAddress, tokenId) const { computedLootBoxAddress } = useEthereumLootBoxQuery(lootBoxAddress, tokenId) const addressToCopy = computedLootBoxAddress || pool.poolAddress return <>
{t('transferTokensToLootBoxContractAddress')}
}
